question: Question_B_01_(b)
statement:
Three friends, Hartosh, Mark and Keiko decide to paint houses over the
summer. Hartosh paints twice as fast as Mark. Hartosh and Keiko paint a
home with six rooms in 8 hours. All three together paint a home with 14
rooms in 16 hours.

\textbf{(b)} Write the system you found above in augmented matrix form.
hints:
The augmented matrix is the matrix A with an extra column, how do we get
the numbers for that extra column?
